meta.article_title: September 27, 2021 - Forehand Push for Playing Choppers

terminologie_extrait.definition: a shot that sends the ball flying back to the opponent's side
terminologie_extrait.contexte: used in forehand pushing and chopper playing

debutant.description: Push the ball back to the opponent after a successful loop, and then attack again

intermediaire.description: Push the ball back to the opponent after a successful loop, and then start over

avance.description: Attack the ball with a stronger loop when the opponent chops back

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice forehand pushing with someone, including the not-as-often-used forehand push

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Don't attack repeatedly without letup, as this can lead to mistakes
